languages.text: "Вы правы, магос. Я благодарен за помощь, но, увы, вынужден скрыть от вас плоды нашей работы". {n}Хейнрикс обводит взглядом зал.{/n} "Как вы могли заметить, у меня есть причины соблюдать осторожность".

"You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."
languages.original_text: "Вы правы, магос. Я благодарен за помощь, но, увы, вынужден скрыть от вас плоды нашей работы". {n}Хейнрикс обводит взглядом зал.{/n} "Как вы могли заметить, у меня есть причины соблюдать осторожность".

traits.locale_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，贤者。我很感谢你的帮助，但遗憾的是，我不得不禁止你接触我们的合作成果。”{n}海因里希扫视了一下大厅。{/n}“如你所见，我的谨慎态度不无根据。”
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，贤者。我很感谢你的帮助，但遗憾的是，我不得不禁止你接触我们的合作成果。”{n}海因里希扫视了一下大厅。{/n}“如你所见，我的谨慎态度不无根据。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene razón, magos. Agradezco la ayuda, pero, por desgracia, debo ocultarle el fruto de nuestra labor». {n}Heinrix mira en torno a la sala.{/n} «Como puede ver, mi precaución está bien fundada».
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, magos. Agradezco la ayuda, pero, por desgracia, debo ocultarle el fruto de nuestra labor». {n}Heinrix mira en torno a la sala.{/n} «Como puede ver, mi precaución está bien fundada».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「その通りですよ、マゴス。助けてくれたことには感謝していますが、残念なことに、我々の努力の成果を君たちから隠さなければならないのです」{n}ハインリックスはホールを見回す。{/n}「見ての通り、我の警戒心には十分な根拠がありますからね」
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りですよ、マゴス。助けてくれたことには感謝していますが、残念なことに、我々の努力の成果を君たちから隠さなければならないのです」{n}ハインリックスはホールを見回す。{/n}「見ての通り、我の警戒心には十分な根拠がありますからね」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr recht, Magos. Ich bin dankbar für die Hilfe, aber leider muss ich Euch die Früchte unserer Arbeit vorenthalten." {n}Heinrix' Blick schweift kurz durch die Halle.{/n} "Wie Ihr gesehen habt, ist meine Vorsicht wohlbegründet."
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr recht, Magos. Ich bin dankbar für die Hilfe, aber leider muss ich Euch die Früchte unserer Arbeit vorenthalten." {n}Heinrix' Blick schweift kurz durch die Halle.{/n} "Wie Ihr gesehen habt, ist meine Vorsicht wohlbegründet."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est exact, magos. Je vous remercie de votre aide, mais je suis malheureusement dans l'obligation de vous cacher les fruits de notre labeur. Comme vous avez pu le constater, ma prudence est justifiée, » {n}dit Heinrix en balayant la salle du regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact, magos. Je vous remercie de votre aide, mais je suis malheureusement dans l'obligation de vous cacher les fruits de notre labeur. Comme vous avez pu le constater, ma prudence est justifiée, » {n}dit Heinrix en balayant la salle du regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Varsayımların doğru Magos. Yardımına minnettar olsam da çalışmamızın meyvelerini maalesef senden gizlemem gerekiyor." {n}Heinrix, etrafına göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Görüldüğü üzere dikkatimin haklı bir sebebi var."
languages.original_text: "You are correct, Magos. I am grateful for the help, but unfortunately, I must conceal the fruits of our labour from you." {n}Heinrix glances around the hall.{/n} "As you have seen, my caution is well founded."

traits.locale_text: "Varsayımların doğru Magos. Yardımına minnettar olsam da çalışmamızın meyvelerini maalesef senden gizlemem gerekiyor." {n}Heinrix, etrafına göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Görüldüğü üzere dikkatimin haklı bir sebebi var."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
